articles.author: Kevin Purdy
articles.title: iFixit’s FixHub tools want to pull soldering away from the wall socket - Ars Technica
articles.description: Battery-powered USB-C soldering iron aims to improve over what's out there.
articles.content:
31
Not being able to solder puts a hard cap on the kinds of devices you can fix at home. As more modern devices add in circuit boards and discrete electronics (needed or otherwise), soldering is oft… [+3013 chars]
